<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ranged Disarm](/Feats.aspx?ID=3239) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Bullet Dancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=117)

**Prerequisites**
[Bullet Dancer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3235); [Trick Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=3188)

**Requirements**
You're wielding a simple firearm.

</column>

---

When using a simple firearm, you can shoot objects right out of your enemy's hands. Attempt to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) the target using a ranged attack roll with your simple firearm, instead of attempting an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check against the target's Reflex DC.
name: Ranged Disarm
